title: Taking offers for sale or trade for Cobb and Wagner
author: mrreality68

posts.post_title: Taking offers for sale or trade for Cobb and Wagner
posts.post_content:
Hi

I am Listening to offers for sale or for trade for these two rare cards 

The trade would involve Babe Ruth and or Joe Jackson cards

Wagner gone
Cobb transaction pending

[quote name="Rhotchkiss" post=2345376]Awesome[/QUOTE]

+1 

Those are awesome cards Jeff

thanks appreciated

I am considering moving them to refocus on my Jacksons and Ruths

never hurts to consider options

Wagner Transaction pending 

Cobb still accepting offers
Wow, the Wagner postcard is AMAZING. Only 14 of these graded out of 2,617+ total graded Wagner playing days cards. You must be upgrading to something epic.

[quote name="brunswickreeves" post=2345650]Wow, the Wagner postcard is AMAZING. Only 14 of these graded out of 2,617+ total graded Wagner playing days cards. You must be upgrading to something epic.[/QUOTE]

Details to follow. Trying to refocus on Ruth and Jackson but also need to build up my liquidity to make a move.. Fun or sad part of collecting. Love my cards but sometimes you have to sacrifice to advance the overall collection.

Hopefully no regrets:):):)

And Still Taking offers on the Cobb
